name: Age of Atlantis
description:
Score a card.
Move your HQ to any Zone. When you visit the Zone with your HQ, gain $2 first.

name: Babylonian Bazaar
description:
Score a card.
⧖: Each player may pay $10 to draw 2 cards and advance 2 of their ♛.

name: Dawn of Man
description:
Score a card.
Each player (including you) advances a ♛ of theirs from Time I.

name: Trojan War
description: Score a card. Lose your $. Draw a card.

name: Ancient Carthage
description:
Draw 2 cards.
Take a Trade Goods card.

name: Empire of the Amazons
description: If you rule here, retreat a ♛ you have here and draw 4 cards. Otherwise, draw 2 cards.

name: Bright Ages
description: Draw 3 cards. Put a card from your hand on top of the deck, face up.

name: Dark Ages
description: Draw 3 cards.
box: When you start a turn here, discard a card.

name: Mongolian Empire
description: Draw 2 cards. If you rule here, other players with as many or more cards in hand than you discard a card.

name: Byzantine Empire
description: Draw 2 cards.
box: When you move here, gain $1 per card in your hand.

name: Greek America
description: Draw 2 cards. If you rule here, you may put a Base here. Either way, if you have a Base here, you may discard a card to gain $6.

name: Scientist Enclave
description: You may retreat a ♛ of yours from here. If you do, take a Gizmo card. Otherwise, draw 2 cards.

name: Celtic Paradise
description:
Draw 2 cards.
⧖: Each player with less than $8 gains $8.

name: Viking America
description: Draw 2 cards.
box: When you move from here to a Time you rule, gain $4.

name: Age of Piracy
description: Play a card. Players in Time I and II lose $2. If you rule here, gain the lost $.

name: Atomic Age
description:
Play a card.
If you rule here, you may move to another real Zone (without visiting it).

name: Age of Plastic
description: Play a card. Choose one: Gain $4 if you rule here; or draw a card if you rule Time II.

name: Dutch Golden Age
description: Play a card. If you rule here, gain half as much $ as you've gained this turn (round down).

name: Pax Britannica
description:
Play a card.
If you have at least 1 ♛ in each Time, gain 4; if at least 2 ♛, gain 8 instead.

name: Y2K
description:
Play a card.
⧖: Each player may discard a Perpetual card to gain $12.

name: Age of Superheroes
description: If you are alone here with exactly 0 cards in hand or $0, advance a ♛ of yours from Time I to here.

name: Floating Cities
description: If you have exactly 6 cards in hand, score a card then play a card.

name: Simulated Paradise
description: If you rule here, put the simulation token in any other Zone. Either way, follow the instructions for the Zone with the token.

name: Singularity
description: If the previous turn was another player's, you may pay $10. If you do, take two more turns after this.

name: Mafia City-States
description: Every other player pays you $1, Score a card.
box: When this Zone becomes real, each player gains $2.

name: Endless City
description: Gain $8. Take a Trade Goods card.
box: When this Zone becomes real, each player draws a card.

name: Poison Earth
description: Gain $8 and draw 2 cards. Take a Poison token.

name: Underground Haven
description: You may discard a card. If you do, gain $12 and if you rule here, take the Sage from the supply or the player that has it.

name: Scrapyard World
description: Score a card, paying by discarding a card per $4 cost, rather than paying $.
